description: Introduces an NPC Character to the player

examples.context: Bordo is an excited goblin merchant.  He is in a tent and has plenty off goods for sale.
dialogue: huh interesting, I'm not sure what you are saying...'

examples.context: Prento is an sullen human farmer.  He is minding his business in his field.
dialogue: Hi.  Is there anything I can do for you?  If not I would suggest you be on your way.
I like to dance with the dolphins
umm...  I'm confused and don't know what you mean.
